title: To Wander

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Heal a player, purging them granting them invincible defence for the night
- Guard a player, granting them basic defence for the night and retaliating against all attackers.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All your visits are astral, and you are not affected by rampaging abilities.
- You cannot target the same player more than once, no matter what.

desc:
Post 1489
*Do you hear me? Can you hear me now?*
